segments.advisor_message: So, uh, your salary, that's your, um, gross income, right?
segments.client_message: Wait, what does gross mean? Like, is it before or after taxes? I always mix it up...

segments.advisor_message: Gross means before taxes, so you'd, like, deduct taxes from that to get your net income.
segments.client_message: Oh, got it! So, if I say I earn, um, 3000, that's gross, right? And what about my rental income, is that gross too?
